description: Provides more information regarding a given organization based on its identifier.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The identifier for the organization to be described.

nested_items.name: DirectoryId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the directory associated with an WorkMail organization.

nested_items.name: DirectoryType
nested_items.description: The type of directory associated with the WorkMail organization.

nested_items.name: DefaultMailDomain
nested_items.description: The default mail domain associated with the organization.

nested_items.name: CompletedDate
nested_items.description: The date at which the organization became usable in the WorkMail context, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: (Optional) The error message indicating if unexpected behavior was encountered with regards to the organization.

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the organization.

nested_items.name: MigrationAdmin
nested_items.description: The user ID of the migration admin if migration is enabled for the organization.

nested_items.name: InteroperabilityEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates if interoperability is enabled for this organization.
